TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ReportServerException extends Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewerException

Docs.summary: Represents errors that occur while connecting to a report server and also errors that occur on the report server while processing a server report or rendering the report to the report page layout (RPL) format.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportServerException"> class with error message, error code, and inner exception.
Returns the error code from the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For a list of errors that the report server returns, see [SoapException Errors Table](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d57866f5-d876-41ce-bc49-0e72486a9617) in SQL Server Books Online.
